newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle Tuesday roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle Tuesday roundup - USDA.

text.p: Trade was inactive in the Panhandle area Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were not tested.
Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers. There were 21,600 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 14,900 formulated and 400 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
The last established price was $66.00 per cwt on Friday. Tuesday's packer bids were $65.00-$66.00 early, late mostly $65.00, with asking prices $68.00.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Confirmed - None Week ago - 53,400 Year ago - 600
Wk to Date - 21,600 Week ago - 75,300 Year ago - 2,600
